name: BrewMate
description: BrewMate - Homebrew App GUI Manager for macOS
author: Roman Kurnovskii

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:renderer: tsc src/renderer/renderer.ts --outDir dist/src/renderer --target ES2020 --module none --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p dist/src/renderer && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp src/renderer/index.html dist/src/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/styles.css dist/src/renderer/ && if [ -d src/assets ]; then cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/; elif [ -d assets ]; then cp -r assets/* dist/assets/; fi
scripts.build:mas: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder --mac --config.mac.target=mas --config.mac.entitlements=build/entitlements.mas.plist --config.mac.entitlementsInherit=build/entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --config.mac.hardenedRuntime=false --config.mac.type=distribution
scripts.build:mas:dir: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder --mac --config.mac.target=dir --config.mac.entitlements=build/entitlements.mas.plist --config.mac.entitlementsInherit=build/entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --config.mac.hardenedRuntime=false --config.mac.type=distribution
scripts.build:mas:universal: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder --mac --config.mac.target=mas --config.mac.arch=universal --config.mac.entitlements=build/entitlements.mas.plist --config.mac.entitlementsInherit=build/entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --config.mac.hardenedRuntime=false --config.mac.type=distribution
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && npm run build:icon && electron-builder --mac
